short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RTI Client communication with browser web extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RTI Client communication with browser web extension
NICE Robotic Process Automation provides smart decisioning, contextual guidance and process automation for optimizing customer interactions in real-time. In order to interact with any web based application running in Chrome, this extension provides full connectivity and functionality.
